pr_title: xds: Added IncompleteData interface in mock CEL library

timeline.message: Added IncompleteData interface in Java Cel library stub

timeline.bodyText:
"Add an ..." sounds like the PR description copied as Javadoc comment here. Shouldn't this be something like "Interpreter returns an instance of {@code IncompleteData} if an object is an instance of {@link PartialMessage}" .
I am assuming PartialMessage is defined somewhere.
timeline.author: sanjaypujare
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,27 @@

+package io.grpc.xds.internal.rbac.engine.cel;
+
+/**
+ * Add an interface for interpreter to check if an object is an instance

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the review! PartialMessage is defined internally, and from API-wise we don't need it at this moment. Regarding to the comment, We copied them from the internal CEL lib, but I agreed that the original comments could be improved, and yours are much better... @cindyxue Can you please update them? Thanks!
replies.author: ZhenLian

replies.bodyText: Thank you both for the review and the comments! Fixed :)
replies.author: cindyxue

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/xds/src/main/java/io/grpc/xds/internal/rbac/engine/cel/IncompleteData.java b/xds/src/main/java/io/grpc/xds/internal/rbac/engine/cel/IncompleteData.java index e6c7bdf1f..7de8d4282 100644 --- a/xds/src/main/java/io/grpc/xds/internal/rbac/engine/cel/IncompleteData.java +++ b/xds/src/main/java/io/grpc/xds/internal/rbac/engine/cel/IncompleteData.java @@ -17,8 +17,8 @@ package io.grpc.xds.internal.rbac.engine.cel; /** - * Add an interface for interpreter to check if an object is an instance - * of PartialMessage. + * Interpreter returns an instance of {@code IncompleteData} if + * an object is an instance of {@link PartialMessage}. * *

This is a Java stub for evaluating Common Expression Language (CEL). * More information about CEL can be found in https://github.com/google/cel-spec.
